CustomField.description: TRUE if lead company name has a keyword in it
CustomField.formula:
IF( OR( CONTAINS( LOWER(Company), "law"), CONTAINS( LOWER(Company), "firm"), CONTAINS( LOWER(Company), "attorney"), CONTAINS( LOWER(Company), "legal"), CONTAINS( LOWER(Company), "office"), CONTAINS( LOWER(Company), "lawyer"), CONTAINS( LOWER(Company), "pllc"), CONTAINS( LOWER(Company), "plc"), CONTAINS( LOWER(Company), "lawyer"), CONTAINS( LOWER(Company), "mediation"), CONTAINS( LOWER(Company), "p.a."), CONTAINS( LOWER(Company), "pc"), CONTAINS( LOWER(Company), "court"), CONTAINS( LOWER(Company), "group"), CONTAINS( LOWER(Company), "consulting"), CONTAINS( LOWER(Company), "esq"), CONTAINS( LOWER(Company), "esquire"), CONTAINS( LOWER(Company), "partners"), CONTAINS( LOWER(Company), "associate"), CONTAINS( LOWER(Company), "llc"), CONTAINS( LOWER(Company), "inc"), CONTAINS( LOWER(Company), "services") ),
TRUE, FALSE)
CustomField.inlineHelpText: TRUE if lead company name has a keyword in it
CustomField.label: Firm Name Keyword
